info.name: HttpOnly Cookie - Detect
author: mr. bobo hp
info.description: Checks whether cookies in the HTTP response contain the HttpOnly attribute. If the HttpOnly flag is set, it means that the cookie is HTTP-only

curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/35.0.2309.372 Safari/537.36' 'http://36.155.98.9:27071/privatemanage/Action/System/Login.do'

info.name: OpenResty detection
author: jcockhren
info.description: Some deployments of OpenResty spill their version numbers.

curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/35.0.2309.372 Safari/537.36' 'http://36.155.98.9:27071/privatemanage/Action/System/Login.do'
